dataModel.title: Prototype Veg Plots Database Component Description: projectContributor
dataModel.author: John Harris

entity.entitySummary: This table stores information about a party contributing to a project.
entity.entityDescription: This table serves as an interesection entity used to 'link' a party with a specific project where vegetation plots are described.

attribute.attDefinition: Database assigned value for a party contributing to a project.
Database assigned value for a given project – this is a link to the project entity.
Database assigned value for a given party this is a link to the party entity.
The role that a specific party (party_id) had in the project (project_id) - this can include such roles as PI, contact, author, etc. This will be linked to an entity named:
